metadata.title: CVE-2017-2626 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: It was discovered that libICE before 1.0.9-8 used a weak entropy to generate keys. A local attacker could potentially use this flaw for session hijacking using the information available from the process list.

criterions.comment: libice package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:1.0.9-2').
